courses.description: Professional graduation with 240 hours duration, focused on website and web system development. During the course, I acquired solid knowledge in HTML5, CSS3, programming logic, JavaScript, modern frameworks (React, Vite, NextJS, Tailwind), PHP, responsive design and MySQL databases.

Continuous education through Alura and other online platforms, with constant certification updates in React, Node.js, TypeScript, Next.js and modern technologies. The learning focus is on frameworks, programming, best practices and keeping up with current web development trends.

q1.question: What is the average timeframe for project development?
q1.answer: The timeframe varies according to project complexity. Simple projects can take 2-4 weeks, while more complex projects may take 2-6 months. I always provide a detailed timeline after analyzing the requirements.

q2.question: Do you offer post-delivery support?
q2.answer: Yes! I offer technical support for 30 days after delivery, including bug fixes and minor adjustments. I also provide monthly maintenance plans for continuous updates and improvements.

q3.question: What technologies do you use?
q3.answer: I mainly work with React, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, Python, and databases like PostgreSQL and MongoDB. I always choose the most suitable technologies for each specific project.

q4.question: How does the development process work?
q4.answer: I follow an agile methodology: 1) Requirements analysis, 2) Prototyping and design, 3) Iterative development, 4) Testing and validation, 5) Deploy and delivery. I maintain constant communication throughout the entire process.

q5.question: Do you work with international projects?
q5.answer: Yes! I have experience with international clients and work remotely. I can adapt to different time zones and communicate fluently in Portuguese and English.
